mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cust ( cust_id, cust_pwd, cust_name, cust_age, cust_gender, cust_phone, cust_address, trainer_id, cust_point ) VALUES ( #{custId}, #{custPwd}, #{custName}, #{custAge}, #{custGender}, #{custPhone}, #{custAddress}, NULL, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE cust SET cust_pwd = #{custPwd}, cust_name = #{custName}, cust_age = #{custAge}, cust_phone = #{custPhone}, cust_address = #{custAddress} WHERE cust_id = #{custId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment WHERE cust_id = #{custId} AND product_name LIKE '%필라%' AND payment_status = 'SUCCESS'
